thread.title: BRIEF-Victory Giant Technology to set up investment management unit
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Victory Giant Technology to set up investment management unit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Victory Giant Technology to set up investment management unit
text:
Sept 22 Victory Giant Technology Huizhou Co Ltd
* Says plans to set up investment management unit with registered capital of 100 million yuan ($15.69 million)
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1gIXKJw
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3743 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
